description_text:
Hey, so just got your haptics Ben pro And for some reason, the control box
is dead Did everything Three different pcs Update everything Check device
manager Everything I could’ve done They are not Working Switch the Power
cable Data cable None This is a joke Got them yesterday

null

conversations.body_text: Hi ٰ,  Could you provide a video showing the device not working? The control box is generally very durable, so please don’t worry — I’ll check it for you and make sure the issue is properly resolved.

After the brief discussion with ChatGPT got to my main PC  debug everything
I could at the end  Just press The update button on the Control box For 10
seconds And the light just went out The little white light And then I don’t
know how the hell it’s just come back to life And it’s working great With
your software And simhub Sorry about the Rough lest  message Was just a bit
frustrated Ty
Best regards

null
Hi ٰ,  No problem, I’m glad your issue has been resolved. If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact us anytime.
